Great job. I will call 3rd Gen again when I have a need.
Can’t say enough about these folks.   Very professional, good people.  I highly recommend 3rd Generation Septic.
Great service and very professional. I recommend 3rd generation septic service very highly. They did an excellent job and timely.
Definitely recommend, they were at my house the same day I called, very friendly, helpful and they did a good job.
Great service and very helpful!!

Was not having any problems but thought it would be a good idea to have my septic tank pumped out, good thing they showed me the there is a clean out screen in there that I should clean out every year to keep prevent problems that I could do myself and save money, l thanked them for taking time to show me and will use them again, I did learn that it's best to  text them I thing they stay pretty busy and I will recomend them job done well
I highly recommend Shawn and 3rd Generation Septic. They did an excellent job for my clients and were fast, affordable, and friendly.

Shawn and his crew were amazing today. They came out to the house (Oxford area) on short notice and were able to quickly assess the situation. Once they were able to get all the materials needed to do the job, it took them no time to get the job done. When they finished, they cleaned up the yard nicely and made sure all trash was taken care of. Their customer service was awesome and made sure to explain everything that they were doing and how it was going to affect the septic and the yard. Strongly recommend this team of awesome individuals to anyone.
Shawn does excellent work!

Sent a web message onSunday, thinking they would be closed.   The owner called me back and had a crew out by 10am Monday morning. They got my septic dug up and fixed same day. Excellent service and awesome people to work with! Highly recommend!!

Excellent service and an affordable price!  Very kind service team. They explained everything along the way and gave pointers on how to keep my system working effectively as well as a maintenance schedule.   Definitely give them a call if you need any septic servicing done.  Will be using them from now on!  Thank you!
Great service, very prompt I got next day service very reasonable price,the guys were very helpful and knowledgeable.judy Holt Ranburne Al.

Thank you Shawn and your crew for an outstanding service on our septic issue. Your company will definitely keep us as a customer for any septic issues or problems. This needs to be the first company everyone should call for great services.Thank you guys for a job well done
Fast service on short notice, courteous and professional!! Highly recommend.
Very very great customer service! Fast and efficient job! Explained everything in a detailed manner!!! Highly recommended!
Great company ran by even better people!

Shawn and his crew were on time and very efficient.  Affordable and gave me advice and recommendations concerning keeping my septic system in good working order.  They were recommended to me and I would recommend them too.
These guys worked hard and did a great job.
Came right out and fixed the septic field lines.  Was upfront with the process and for future maintenance.
Very good service very professional and good price
I will very highly recommend them for your septic services they are very dependable they will get my business from now on.

We used 3rd Generation for the replacement of a septic lid in order to facilitate proper function and clean out. Shawn was upfront & clear about the work we needed done and the reasons why. All equipment was professional and in good order. When  there was a snag due to an apparent custom cover that was installed in the past, Shawn devised a timely and cost effective solution that did not alter the quality of the work performed. The crew was well-staffed, polite and diligent. The charge for the work performed was highly affordable, a definite plus! We will definitely use 3rd Generation Septic for any future work we may need. I  recommend you consider them as well.

I HIGHLY recommend 3rd Generation! I called very early this morning and the job was completed by lunchtime. Shaun is very knowledgeable, personable and explains things in great detail. I will definitely refer him to others needing an honest service!
Theses guy are great my septic tank  was hard to get to but they got it done  and in the rain thanks so much
Friendly and very knowledgeable. Would recommend and definitely use them  again.

If I could give 10 stars on this review I would.  I called last night and they were at my house at 7:00 AM this morning and had the problem fixed in less than an hour.  I can't say enough good about them, they are reasonably priced, very professional, and do amazing work!  Will absolutely use them again and highly recommend them!
Does a great job. Reasonable prices
Great family business and prices. Had our septic tank cleaned within few hours after initial call. Highly recommend. Thank you for taking care of our problem.
Pumped my septic tank did a great job and was very prompt. I had a clogged line which they took care of.

This was my first time using this company. I was very pleased and impressed with the great service they provided. I will be using this company for now on. I will refer this company to anybody. Great price for the quality of work. Thanks so much forHelping me this morning with my sewage problem.
Professional and reasonably priced. Definetly call them first for septic/plumbing issues!!
They were very timely. I was able to get them out ti pump my septic tank same day, and they were very polite and professional. Excellent work!
I read all the great reviews and decided to try them. I'm glade we did the did a great job. Very friendly and knowledgable.

I really respect someone who will be straightforward and honest about a situation and really resolve the issue. The owner of the company was very professional and he knows what he’s doing . This company is very affordable and I will use them again And I will recommend them to my friends and family so if you have an issue they will take care of you.

Absolutely the best septic service available in this area! Used him for the first time about a year ago, and now I recommend him to everyone! Very professional, knows what he is doing and gets it done correctly. You couldn’t pay me to use anyone else!! :)
I called these guys on Saturday and they were out here early Sunday morning. Very affordable and professional! Highly recommend!

Shawn came out two days in a row to fix my septic and instal a new lid. He was exceptionally informative and made sure to tell me everything that was going on. I was very happy with the service they provided and will continue to use them. If you want a job done right give them a call.

Very professional, and detailed oriented about the service of inspection and pumping of the septic tank. I recommend 3rd Generation  if you are in need of septic inspection and pumping. Will definitely use 3rd Generation for all septic services.

If I could give a TEN star review, I would!!!  First of all, this company was the only one that STATED they were open before eight o’clock. I called, Shawn (owner and operator) picked up on the first ring!!  Diagnosed my problem on the phone. Specifically told me he had one appointment ahead of me and that he would be at my house around lunchtime!!  It was BEFORE lunchtime when he was sitting in my driveway ready to roll!!!  Shawn and Kyle pulled up already ready to get to work!!  Love this guy and his attitude and willingness to help and get the job done!!!  This is my guy right here from now on!!! My neighbors saw the truck in my yard and I have already slid them his number!!!  This is my guy right here!!!!

Shawn and his crew were amazing. My son talk to him yesterday the 13th and he came out this morning.  He showed me what the problem was and he fixed it. I highly recommend this young man and his crew. Thank you Shawn!
They were so great. I love their  services . Very professional and respectful. On time. Thank for getting my septic tank done.

This company is fantastic. Great service. Great price. Very professional.  Explained and showed me everything that he did.  Showed me that the septic tank was completely empty when he was finished.  Explained me future problems that can arise and how to fix them. Marked out my whole septic tank for me.  He moved a bunch of stuff out of the way that should have already been moved I just didnt think about it because it was raining and said he didnt want me to get wet. Definitely recommend this company!!!!!

Mr. Shawn was so professional; from the initial contact to finishing the job. He made sure to inform me when he was arriving and arrived right at that time. While working he made sure to inform me of the issues he ran into and what he had to do to repair the issue. Mr. Shawn and his team went above and beyond when they were working to fix the issue with my septic system. They were the first company I ever did business with that did not leave a mess when they finished the job. Mr. Shawn noticed I was a veteran and gave me a discount without even asking. If you are looking for the perfect company to hire for your septic needs, 3rd Generation Septic is the way to go.

Shawn is so friendly and easy to work with.  I needed a septic inspection done and he got me fit in right away and went above and beyond to get the job done even with a downed tree in the way.  I can’t thank him enough.  Report sent right away and easy payment process. All around a great family owned company.  Will certainly use again if I need help in the future
Highly recommended very good at what they do! Best price  in town

3rd Generation Septic came out and pumped my septic system. Shawn and another person that was with him, called the morning of the appointment, was on time, and took care of it with no problems. After they finished, they asked me to go inside and flush the commodes to be sure the problem with the sluggish flushes were gone. They were! This company is EXCELLENT! My yard was completely the same as before they came. They made sure to cover the ground up just as it was before. There were no marks left in yard, which is great! The guys even gave me advice to do every few months to help aid the break down of the waste in the septic. They were both very professional and respectful! This will be my go to company and I will recommend them at any given chance! Awesome customer service and a fair price for my job needed. Just a great experience from start to finish!  Thank you, 3rd Generation Septic!!
This is a great septic company!  Awesome customer service and a great value! They are very good at their trade! Give them a call today, you will be glad you did.
Great work called in the morning an was here in 2 hours! An did a amazing job! Will use them every time! Thanks so much
They are super nice guys and very helpful.  Very knowledgeable and helped us out tremendously!!! Thank you so very much!!
Shawn and his helper came to pump our septic tank.  Great service.  Super friendly and informative.  He will be our go-to tank "pumper".
3rd Generation Septic is the one to call. They did an awesome job. Couldn't ask for better service.  Went above and beyond and offered great advice and explanation.
Shawn and his guy were amazing. Replaced a septic lid and pumped my system. Great job. Pleasure to do business with. Arrived on time and took care of the issues quickly.
Great bussines 10/10 work will definitely recomend and use from now on !!!!🐾

Shawn was very helpful  it was very last minute when I reached out to him I told him my situation he made time to come out to get the job did .He was a  Very friendly  person walked me through each steps letting me know what was being did before he proceeded which I liked the communication he had I would def call him again or refer him to anyone he got the job did quick and fast the way I like things less then hour .

They came to pump out my septic tank same day I called.  They were able to  figure out the problem we were having and repair it.  This company is NOW my septic tank and plumbing people.  I will never trust anyone but them.  Very professional and fair price.
They showed up when they said they would. They got the job done pretty quick and were very professional! I would you them again and recommend them everytime!!
The owner was very courteous, fair, and kind. I would recommend them to anyone needing septic work done.
Reliable and Professional, Cleaned and pumped septic tank very well, made suggestions on how to prevent septic problems. Very good workers.
I had a toilet plugged up  for 28 days due to backed up septic tank during covid and they readily came out and pumped the tank and cleared the mountain of poo!
Great service. Showed up on time. Reasonable price

They are really good and nice people. They are easy  to contact and respond right away with your issue. They do their job properly and professionally. They even take good care of your lawn putting it back as they were used to be. I highly recommend their service.

Boy Howdy!  I was astonished at the service, professionalism, knowledge, timely, accurate, and most of all......  I'm a new home owner with no experience/knowledge of Septic tanks.  He took the time to educate me in every area of how the Septic tank works, preventive measurements, & long term care from external angles.  Just a great experience and will always use A&B Svcs.   I'd advise you to try him & see for yourself. Mr Caraway
Very pleasant man. Thankfully it was resolved
Very friendly, helpful, and professional. Have used them twice now to pump my septic tank. Great local business!
Very honest and dependable.
Honest and dependable people with great prices. Definitely people you can count on.
Pleased with the service!
Best experience! You won't regret giving them a call! The only local plumbing service I'll be using! Thanks again! ￯﾿ﾰ￯ﾾﾟ￯ﾾﾘ￯ﾾﾊ

It was a crappy job. Exactly what I needed. Give them a call.
Reliable, knowlagable and quality service. This will be the only company we in the future.

Hands down the absolute best experience I’ve ever had with a plumber. Larry and his team have helped us many times over the past few years. He’s been there for repairs and to help us with plumbing updates. Most recently he did the plumbing for our home bar. He was fast, professional and knowledgeable about what needed to be done and how to do it with minimal damage to the drywall. We couldn’t be happier. I’m always telling my friends and family about him and I encourage anyone reading this review to call him for all of your plumbing needs. 10 out of 10!
Larry is great reasonably priced always on time

Larry did a great job for us. He came the same day we called. I fully expected to need a complete new water heater but he was able to find parts to put it back in operation by the next day. We will gladly call Bear the next time we need plumbing work done. Highly recommend Larry and Bear Plumbing!
Larry came through on the plumbing for our remodel. Did a very good job at a reasonable rate. Thanks Larry!

Larry Overton of Bear Plumbing responded to my request very quickly. He was able to perform the plumbing work at my home within  a short time after arrival.  The costs of the repairs were extremely reasonable. Larry and his co-worker were very respectful, courteous, and knowledgeable. Larry communicated with me prior to arrival to confirm the appointment date & time.  I have scheduled for Larry to perform additional plumbing work at my home because of the great service provided by Bear Plumbing.
Larry did a great job in a timely manner and at a reasonable price!
Larry did several jobs for me and I couldn't be more pleased! He was very professional and showed up when he said he would. The pricing was great also.
Why do water heaters fail on the weekends?  Larry answered promptly, came on time and did a great job.
Was on time courteous neat.Job well done.

Called Alex out to my duplex for two rentals with two malfunctioning water heaters. He fixed them quickly and for a reasonable price. I will be using him for all the repairs on all of my rental properties!

Called Alex Fussell at 9 on a Friday night because there was water coming from the ceiling in my kitchen. He showed up quickly and acted with complete professionalism. He fixed the problem with minimal sheetrock damage. A very neat and timely repair! I am going to recommend him to everyone I know!
My plumbing problem was not an easy one to solve. But, Alex knew what to do and spent a good deal of time making sure everything was right. I don't plan to use any other plumber from now on.

reviews.reviewer_name: Julie Brown, Realtor at Southern Elite Realty, LLC
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Alex Fussell.  He did an outstanding job re-plumbing my house.   If I could give him 10 Stars I would.   If you are in need of any plumbing give him a call!
Fast response and good work!
Great work!  Excellent customer service!
Jason and his crew replaced our water heater a few weeks ago. The unit is performing perfectly since it was installed. They came the same day I called and did the work for a very reasonable price.

I was looking for a good honest plumber and Jason had some really good reviews so we gave him a try and he lived up to those reviews.  He worked us in quickly, communicated when he was running a little behind.  Jason and his crew were very friendly and professional, got the job done and the price was reasonable!

Jason's Drain Service did some work on our older home that included replacing a drain pipe under the house and installing a new pressure control valve. Jason Hunter and his team were friendly, professional and did a great job. If you are looking for a true professional with over 30 years experience who will show up when he promises and get your job done efficiently, give Jason a call. I will definitely call him again when needed.

I called Jason Drain service due to a slowly draining kitchen sink. Sadly, it is a major problem that we won't get fixed until we absolutely have no choice but to do so, in the future. This is at a house that we just bought in another neighborhood. Anyway, Jason and his partner were just the best!!!   Unrelated to drains, my husband was trying to pick at a mound of concrete that the former owners poured onto the driveway. They got out their jack hammer like tool and helped him out before they left.

I recently used Jason’s Drain Service for 2 jobs.   Don’t let the name fool you, they do much more than drains. They replaced a hot water heater (job 1) and replaced the cartridges in both of my bathtub faucets (job 2).  Both faucets are working perfectly now and we have plenty of hot water. Their pricing is reasonable.

However, the best thing about them is their willingness to work with your schedule and punctuality. For both jobs, I asked them to come on a specific date. They can on the date requested and were here shortly after 8:00.  This is a drastic change from my previous plumber who was totally unreliable.

Jason also did not mind me standing over his shoulder and asking questions. He even stayed a couple of extra minutes to make sure that one faucet stopped dripping.

His prices are reasonable.  He is *extremely* fair with his pricing.

He is also very helpful with general information without charging for just a 5 minute conversation.

EDIT: I just used him for a third job.  He again was very punctual which was amazing given we are in the middle of a very hard freeze.  His price for today's job was more than fair.

I highly recommend Jason’s Drain Service.
Did great and quick work on a leak I had outside going under the sidewalk. Thanks!
Honest, quick, and great pricing!
Excellent and trustworthy service. Highly recommend.

This is the plumber I've been looking for all these years. For real, Jason's drain was the 6th plumber I tried. Some of the others were bad, some were alright, but Jason was the only one that was great. It is such a relief to finally find a plumber I can trust and rely on. Thank you Jason!
He had great communication skills and got to my job in a very prompt manner. Perfect work and very reasonable price. Would not hesitate to use him again. 7 out of 5 stars.
These guys are great. Very professional, reasonable price, on time, quick and clean. If needed will definitely use again!

I was very happy that I called  Jason drain service. A very  professional  service. I am well pleased with the service that was given. Jason is a very nice kind person and I recommend this business. Thanks Jason.
Very professional plumbing company.  Very honest and came on time, did a great job, cleaned up afterwards.  I recommend highly.
Honest and straightforward. Excellent service and stands by his work.

Awesome people!! Hands down will call them for all my plumbing needs! Jason is trust worthy and gets the job done.  The young fellow with him is very respectful and helpful! This is who yall need to go with!! Good job!!
The guys came out short notice, stayed until they got it right, & the price was very reasonable. Highly recommend!
Very straightforward and trustworthy... You can leave them in the house and go. Would recommend to faily and friends. A+
Great local guy that is honest and reliable.  Will definitely call again for my water issue needs!
Quality work, great pricing, and friendly service!

We have used Jason's Drain Service multiple times over the past few years. He has done plumbing jobs for my husband and I when we needed EMERGENCY work done, AND one job that ended up being more extensive than planned - but was the BEST job yet. He has done work on the interior and exterior of our older house, AND has upgraded fixtures for us. We couldn't be happier. He is honest, efficient, hard working, and the price point was a relief for us. In a day when it's hard to find service workers who possess both skill and integrity, I HIGHLY recommend Jason, who has both!

salser-plumbing-and-septic-service-llc.business name: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

reviews.review_text: Great company, very responsive came out to fix the issue same day. Quality work at a good price would definitely recommend.

Brandon responded to my text quickly on Sunday stating he could be at my house by 9:30 Monday morning. He actually showed up early texting me when he was on his way. My sump pump was not working, he identified the problem quickly. My float had gone bad, he replaced the float with one he had at his shop so there was no ordering parts. Works perfectly now, he even took the time to fix one of my toliets. He was very professional and just a really nice guy. The price was better than I expected especially with the time and effort it took. Will definitely be using his services in the future.
Highly recommend! Quality work done efficiently with a great sense of humor!

My father needed help with his line backing up. Salser plumbing was on time and returned
My calls. He pumped the tank and repaired issues at both ends. Very good price and service. I recommend Salser plumbing if your in need of such services.
Very good at what they do, will recommend them to everyone.
Courteous and knowledgeable people. They did a great job installing filtration system on my house!!!
Great job as always. He's always ontime and knows his stuff.

Made the appointment, arrived as promised. Very professional and efficient in his work and great quality repair and install! No mess to clean up and very reasonably priced Highly recommend this company for your plumbing needs.

Hydrotech Plumbing recently did a few projects in our home and we couldn't be more pleased! Michael is first class in his professionalism and in his work. We've found our plumber for any future plumbing needs we may have due to the great work he does.
We greatly appreciated his work and we highly recommend Hydrotech Plumbing for any plumbing projects you may have!

Thanks again!

Keys Family
Guntersville Alabama

Very Professional, called when he was on his way. Competent, explained the problem, and didn’t waste any time getting it resolved.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Michael is awesome
Michael is great.  Professional.  Knowledge.  Communicates well.  We have used Michael in the past and now again with HydroTech.  Give Michael a call.  You will not be disappointed.
Great service….Josh was dependable, knowledgeable and offered fair pricing.  I would call again for future service.
Great service! Josh was quick to return my call and took care of my plumbing issue. Highly recommend you give them a call!!
Josh did an awesome job. He was responsive to my call/messages, was on time, and repaired our leak quickly. Very professional and reasonably priced.
Our second time using Reese and he did an excellent job! Highly recommend!
Amazing plumber! Cant say enough about his work! We have used him many times and will with any plumbing problem in the future. Highly recommend!
Josh did an excellent job on rerouting some water lines for a new shower install. Very courteous and timely . I highly recommend him.
Josh has serviced my restaurant several times.  He showed up timely and quickly fixed the issue.  I have recommended him to my friends and family and I will continue to use him for my plumbing needs!
Josh was on time and very professional.  His recommendations were practical and he fixed my issue in 30 minutes.  I will be using Josh for all of my future plumbing needs!  Highly recommend!

We got a recommendation for Josh from the company who sold us a new kitchen faucet.  We called him after receiving a ridiculous installation quote from our normal plumbers, and Josh did excellent work for a more reasonable price.  He showed up on time.  He was very kind and professional.  He didn’t leave a mess.  I realized that the plumbing he had to connect to was wonky because of a previous bad installation, but he did not complain and he handled the challenge with ease and got everything working in no time.  We will absolutely use Josh from now on for all plumbing work, and we recommend him highly.  It was a stroke of luck to find him.
My family and I have used Josh twice now. He is such a nice guy. Super professional, got the job done quickly and was very reasonably priced.

Josh did a fantastic job. Very professional, timely and great job. They had to dig up part of our yard but afterwards you could hardly tell. They took great care to make our yard perfect after replacing our pipes. Highly recommend!

I would definitely recommend Reese Plumbing! I have used Josh’s services twice and was pleased with the results both times. It was easy to make an appointment, Josh showed up on time and was friendly, efficient and professional. He fixed the problems quickly  and I will call him the next time I need a plumber.
He has gone above and beyond to fix every problem we have had. Always very nice and polite. And makes sure the job is done right every time!

Josh is an excellent plumber who has always shown up, and he has always fixed our issues. He has completed every job with a smile and appreciation. He always answers the phone and is willing to help. If Josh tells you he’s going to be there, he’s there. He keeps the schedule he tells you which really helps on construction jobs. Thanks for the always excellent service, Josh! 5 stars, highly recommend!
Efficient and courteous plumber.
Awesome service ..Josh did a wonderful job..we use Reese for all our plumbing needs.

Needed some facuet's replaced Colin came out did a remarkable job So professional an fast they look Amazing Such A Great Company to do business with An very reasonable wouldn't have wanted better service!

Wow....David and Colin came in and took care of all our faucet and toliet repairs in a flash. Such nice people and really good with our 4 legged guys running around. They were on-time and actually running early and gave me a 30 minutes heads up to see if I was OK with it, which I was glad to hear. I have no problem recommending them or calling them again for plumbing or gas line issues. This is a fantastic small business and very worth your consideration.

I cannot speak highly enough of Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance. I called their office one afternoon and within a few hours, they arrived at our house to fix our water leak. They kept us informed throughout the process and explained where the leak was. Do not hesitate to contact Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance!

We have used David Strickland several times for different projects, the latest being the replacement of our hot water heater.  He comes when he says he will be there, he is quick to respond when you call, and he does a great job.  We won't use anyone else.

This is a fantastic company.  It's owned by an individual, which I like.  But what I like more is that they were on time, did an excellent job on installing a new toilet and a kitchen sink faucet, and it didn't cost the earth.  This is the only company I'll use when I need a plumber.

David Strickland installed a gas tankless hot water heater for us this week and, as always, did a fantastic job. David is the only plumber we use & he has helped us for many years. We highly recommend him.
We have had Strickland do two home projects for us now. They got it done quickly and professionally. Honest, friendly, locally owned company, and highly recommend.
David Strickland installed a new sink in our kitchen. He was quick, professional, and very reasonably priced.  Highly recommend him!
I highly recommend Strickland for all plumbing repairs.  Professional and all around great person!
Great service! I've used them twice now for separate issues. Each time they made it out earlier than the appointments and had me fixed within an hour.
If you want a job done right, and to be treated like a customer wants to be treated, then call Strickland Plumbing.  By far the most experienced and professional plumber around. Highly recommended !!

So my hot water heater decided to call it kaput two days before Thanksgiving. I called a couple places but they were super busy, and couldn’t get out. I got referred to these guys and they came out the same day. My water heater was shot, and had to be replaced. Jarrett did a great job and cleaned up when he was done. Efficient and on time. I was so glad to have my hot water heater replaced right before the holiday- it would be horrible to have been without hot water on a major cooking holiday!
Worked is in quick to replace our hot water heater and fix two outside faucets that busted. Very knowledgeable and did great work!
Good

reviews.reviewer_name: Bob and Debbie Stretch Silverleaf Realty Group
reviews.review_text:
They showed up on time. Communication was excellent.
I will definitely will use you again.
Thank you Austin!
Service was easy to schedule, employee was early and was able to complete all task as explained. Absolutely recommended
Arrived on time, clearly explained items needing attention, and reviewed work to be sure I was satisfied. Exceptional service.
Austin was polite, professional and tidy. It took less than 45 mins to do the job and check for leaks. Thank you.
Perfect work, very satisfied

Used A.C.E for a job at one of my rentals and safe to say, we have found our new go-to guy. Arrived when he said he would (actually early), communicated effectively, did the job right the first time. Really refreshing to finally find a reliable contractor around here.

I sent Jared a picture of my old water heater and from his experience he was able to tell me that my water heater had been leaking for quite a while and suggested that it was time to get a new one if I was ready. We set up an appointment and he brought a new electric water heater (better quality and more efficient then lows and Hm dept) and installed it. He made the proper fitting adjustments to my old pipes. He also helped me locate my water meter so that he could turn off the water it was covered in 2 inches of dirt and he dug it out. He is very professional and polite (ma'am). Don't hesitate to contact this company. You will be satisfied with the end result and finally have hot water. Don't wait!!!!

reviews.review_text:
I posted a request for a local plumber for an RV Leak . Most residential businesses shy away from this because of the aggregation and difference between RV and residential .
5 minutes after my post I got a call from Evans Plumbing . I was told that they could help me out “ sometime “ after lunch
I realized that they were busy and already doing other scheduled projects . I was told they would be able to help me sometime after lunch . Well . Got a call at 5:30 pm  , Nick , with Evans Plumbing is at my driveway gate .  ?  What , ??  I used to own my own construction business , by 5:30pm I wanted to be at home with my family ( and beer ) .
He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !

Mark Harrison was very nice and professional and extremely reasonable. I absolutely will contact him the next time we need a plumber!

I'm reviewing the plumbing service I received from Mike's Plumbing and Electric.  They were dispatched via my home warranty company.  They responded quickly to my issue, showed up on time, and called me when they were enroute.  The technician was polite, courteous, and took the time to let me walk him through the issue we were having with our bathtub.  He fixed the problem promptly and even gave me a few pointers to help me prevent similar issues in the future.

I've seen a few bad reviews from people based on their "home warranty" and their repair not being covered.  Whether you dispatch a plumber, electrician, or AC specialist, they can only cover items that your home warranty company lets them cover, based on your contract (that you picked).  People should read their contracts first before taking their frustrations out on a local business.  Cheaper home warranties cover less items, go figure.

Robert and Jeremy came out today and did a wonderful job. They came in and had our problem fixed in no time. Very knowledgeable and efficient. I would recommend this company to anyone needing repairs.

Ron has been in the plumbing trade for over 40yrs. I can ask him to resolve anything from replacing a garbage disposal to fixing a fireplace (gas pipe) without having to follow-up with him.  He gets the job done, often goes beyond expectation, and is quick to communicate…even when he just got out of the hospital.  I love this guy, and he reminds me why I miss my Southern Americans and their gracious inviting charm! -David Lanfkord Maj, USAF (ret)

Diligent young man. Arrives when he says he will be on site and communicates well. Quality work. RE-configured two bathrooms for us during remodel including adding a shower. reviews.review_text: Excellent plumbing company all the way around. I had a hot water line break under concrete. They came up with a plan and had everything fixed, from first call until completed, in under two hours. These guys are timely, honest, intelligent, and efficient.

Amazing service, pricing, and reliability. No other name comes to mind when someone asks for a good plumber, or when I need to call someone for my own needs. 5/5, 10 out of 10, always recommend.

These guys go above and beyond.  I have used them multiple times.  The first time was to correct another services mess up.  Nick and his crew are very professional and knowledgeable from minor to very major plumbing needs.  I highly recommend Prestons Plumbing!

Mr. Byers was on time, very friendly, and professional. He even came the same day that I called, which was a plus. He was able to fix my plumbing issue, and his rates are great. I would definitely call him again and I would recommended him to anyone.

I had a small leak + wanted to add a valve. Very honest and proffesional, He even suggested that I will do the fix myself and he will explain me how. Such a honest and great guys!!! I will call them again for any plumbing issues.

Thank you!

Anthony showed up around 915, took a quick look at things and got to work digging where the leak was springing from. After about 2.5 hours he was all done. I Greatly Appreciate the Customer Service and Education on Septic and plumbing Equipment..

What an awesome experience. In the process of selling my father's home and didn't know it had a septic tank as opposed to a public sewer system. I was told that any plumbing service could inspect and provide the clearance letter needed for selling the home. Thanks to my realtor for doing the leg work and calling different plumbing companies, he gave me Delta's number, and because I had used them in the past I felt comfortable scheduling the inspection for my father's home.

Calling and speaking with Ms. Opal to set up the appointment went without a hitch as she was so very courteous and took the time to answer my questions and was very detailed in the information that she needed as well as the work that would be performed. She even sent a follow up email to let me know that she received my signed authorization form that I emailed back to her....I didn't even have to call and ask....WOW.

The pleasant experience didn't stop there, Mr. Trace called me once he arrived to the property and then called me back to let me know the results of the inspection. Because I was out of town taking care of my mother, Mr. Trace could have told me anything, but yet he was honest to confirm that the tank was in very good condition and didn't need any service.

Thank you to both Ms. Opal and Mr. Trace for your awesome customer service, your attention to detail, and keeping the customer top of mind!! Awesome!
Very courteous and knowledgeable when explaining the issues and resolves where possible. Thank you Jerry
Anthony was a pleasure to work with. Very informative and took the time to diagnose and determine the best path forward. Would hire again, no issues!

Ivan was incredible!  What looked like it should be an easy task ended up being alot more complicated.  After attempting a variety of options, he settled on the best one to achieve my request. AWESOME AWESOME........ Jacob & Delta Plumbing are 5 star plus in my book.   We had a serious plumbing and called Delta and they were here very quickly since it was an emergency and we didn't want out brand new floor and bathroom ruined because of the back up that was caused from 64 year old cast iorn pipes rusting and breaking apart.    They were here 2 days assessing the job, was here early in the day Wednesday and started the job.  Every piece of dirt was put back into place.....lol .......and the made special care of not tearing up a new baby tree that had just been planted recently.  They doubled checked the water to make sure it was running threw the new pipes properly, had me run water threw the washing machine several times so that everything was flowing correctly and not backing up again.  The speediness and care they gave me was top notch.  Everything they had to do or needed to do they told me first and asked if i wanted to do it and yes we did it.  And I couldn't be happier.  In the past we have used several different plumbers but no one has ever taken the time to explain everything to us and give us the option as to what we wanted to do, and give me the respect I deserve being that its our house and our money.  No pressure or pushing us into a decision we needed to think about it and go over with him on.   I totally recommend Delta Plumbing for any and all plumbing problems they would be the one's I'd call and "will" call.  Thank you Jacob for your help, your kindness and concern of what could have happened in the very near future had we not had all those pipes replaced.  Thank you Delta
Great guys and they were flexible on the price.  For sure, they will be the first company I call next time!

Excellent. Highly recommend. Thank you.

I would highly recommend for the quick fix jobs of a dripping faucet,  toilet changeout, etc. and/or the larger full remodel/new construction  I have used him on Both and my brother and father have also.  I don’t leave many reviews because not many people now days are worthy of a good review.  But I wanted to be sure I left one for Joey and Acme Plumbing.

Acme Plumbing replaced a water heater as agreed. They were prompt and professional in their work. Will call again for any plumbing needs. Thank you!

While trying to remove a water hose that was attached too tightly our super old water spiket broke right off the wall and water sprayed everywhere. I was truly impressed with Jason. I bought a new sink and cabinet for my bathroom and after two days of trial and error of trying to do the work myself I decided to call and let a professional handle it. Jason did the job in 1 hour. Will use him again and will come highly recommended. If I could give 10 stars I would the best I've seen in awhile
Fair prices Jason does what he says he'll do when he says he'll do it.
Acme plumbing did of tankless water heater and redid some of our plumbing. He was on time he came gave a quote and did the work in the same day it was very quick. Highly recommended!!
Jason was very nice new what he was doin. And replaced my water heater in a short time. I was very satisfied!!!! Thank you so much. Karen Stone.
I know God is good.  Jason of Acme show up and showed out. He fix my shower divert valve and blessed me with a Zero payment. This is the type of Hero we need in this pandemic times. Thanks

Jason was extremely punctual when i was in need of an experienced plumber. Upon arrival, he asked questions and got straight to work. Todd Brown did a great job! He replaced my tub, my tub was an odd size and he took his time and figured out a way to make a smaller tub work in that spot. So professional and polite! Great work and no mess! Fair pricing! Would totally recommend!!!!

Todd did a great job replacing my leaking shower/tab valve. He came on the scheduled time and explained to me what needs to be done. Also, his price is affordable. They do background check on all their contractors before recommending.

Todd Brown was a great plumber, he came out quickly on a weekend to check out our sewage pump. His diagnostic price was reasonable and less than any of the other plumbers I called. I spoke with 3 other plumbers and was quoted $3-5k, but Todd did it for significantly less. Once the job was complete, he showed me that everything was functioning and was on his way. Definitely recommend and he'll be the first I'll call in the future.

Browns plumbing showed up on time and fixed our problems! He was very nice and explained what needed to be done. Very professional and clean. The price he gave me was very good for the amount of work we needed. I will use him for all our plumbing needs.

Had a a broken pipe and no water at 10pm. My wife gets to shower in the a.m. and all is well thanks to Brown's Plumbing Solutions. Very professional, friendly, and a great price. Thanks for helping me out!!!

Absolutely the best and most professional plumber.  He worked us in right away.  Quick, efficient and friendly.  Thanks Dan.

Dan came out after hours on the same day we contacted him to help us out. He was quick and it was obvious he knew what he was doing. The issue was resolved in under an hour and we couldn't be happier. We'll be calling him again for future plumbing projects/needs.

Dan arrived on time and did a great job.  Very friendly as well!
Highly recommend.

Dan was very easy to deal with! Showed up on time, did the work, left everything in good shape and at a reasonable price. I don’t know what else you could ask for. And he’s a super nice guy! Highly recommend.

Dan went out of his way to take care of my issue. I had two toilets dripping down on the ceiling on the floor below. He drove quite a distance to help.  I just moved to Alabama and my house is on a slab and doesn't have the best access points to just switch something out. So much you find out after the close of the house I guess.

Dan was able to assess the problem and tackled it. You're in good hands with Dan!
My go to for all my service and new construction plumbing.

Wonderful & friendly customer service - it was less than 3 hours from the time I called to request a technician to having our sink operational again! We definitely will be repeat customers for any plumbing needs we have in the future!

PlumberDan is the BEST!
He immediately texted me back when I left a message and was at my house within 2 hours.  It’s difficult to find anyone in this area who returns calls and actually shows up! Especially when I’m only here part time. So happy he was my first call.  I won’t use anyone else!!!

Started hearing horn sounds from the pipes that was getting louder and louder.  We were going to have company and needed this fixed asap. I Called Plumber Dan and they came out and fixed it on the same day, even worked in the rain to get the job done. Would highly recommend and I would call them again if I need future plumbing work.

I called PlumberDan because we discovered a leaking pipe at our office after the freeze. I would call him again.

We use Plumber Dan for all of our plumbing needs. They are always professional and extremely nice. They offer great work at an extremely fair price. The work we have had done is second to none. You can’t go wrong with Plumber Dan!

Very friendly, responsive, and knowledgeable. Most importantly, very honest. Plumber Dan’s attention to detail sets him apart from any other plumber we’ve used. There is no other plumber I would consider using. Highly recommend.

I can't thank the PlumberDan crew, especially the gentleman that came and replaced out water heater. He was polite, professional, and attentive to our issue. PlumberDan is the way to go when you have plumbing need. 10stars from us!

Plumber Dan was very thorough when searching for our leaks. He made sure to explain the repairs and cost before anything was done. The fix date was set promptly. Plumber Dan was easy to work with and was very professional. He diagnosed our issue and had it resolved quickly. We will definitely be calling PD for any future needs!

Austin did an amazing job!!!!

Amazing work! He's done some updates as well as fixed an emergency leak in my attic. Super grateful that he's friendly, trustworthy and charges reasonably. Will definitely call Southern Shores Plumbing if I need anything in the future!

smith-and-sons-septic-tank-services-plum.business name: Smith And Sons Septic Tank Services & Plumbing

reviews.review_text: Great guys and great service. They were here on time and did a great job!

I cannot say enough about Veterans plumbing. We were a victim of these crazy freezing temps and our laundry room pipe busted late Christmas afternoon. I called several plumbers and someone recommended Nick with Veterans. I called him and he answered on Christmas Day and said he could send someone out the next day. Every other plumber was Tuesday or Wednesday the earliest. They showed up early too and the value compared to what I have paid before was unbeatable. I had to ask Nick if the price was correct before I paid, as it was the best price I have seen in sometime. I am so glad I received this recommendation and they will definitely be my new plumbers of choice going forward!
We had our main water line leaking. Nick did an amazing job replacing the line and then helped us with extensive piping issue in our basement. Quality work, honest company. Highly recommend.
I received same day service.  They showed up on time.  Discussed issues with me before doing repair.  Cost was reasonable.  Very courteous.  Veterans is my plumber of choice.
Outstanding service. Arrived on time and did the job in very quick and professional way. I would highly recommend this company to anyone.
Nick was very polite and professional and did the work in a timely manner.
Very personable  and professional.He took about an hour and a half to identify 5 leaks in my water line and  fix them plus covered back up the trench.
Very polite and professional! I have used this young man several times. He knows his plumbing. You won’t be disappointed!
Great work! Respectful, and easy to work with.
Very responsive and helpful. Would use their service again and highly recommend them!

We were building a garage apartment that had no plumbing or water to the structure. After several quotes, we decided to go with veteran plumbing. Nick was great to work with and very professional. The quality of work was top notch. I had concerns over locating and running water to the apartment, but Nick very professionally located the water line and was able to determine the best options to correctly run the water line to the new structire. I am very pleased with the service and finished product that Nick provided. I would highly recommend him and he will be my first call when I need future work. Great experience

Nick is a professional in all definitions of the word professional. We have used him on multiple occasions for different plumbing needs.  A true Veteran and brother in arms who stands by his country and his work 110%.

Nick had been great working with us. Quality work, he has done work for us and our children with on time service  and competitive prices. What impresses me most is he uses top notch materials and has always let us know what he wants to do and it has always been in our best interest. We have postponed work to make sure we use him instead of others. Highly recommend, if you have an opportunity use Nick/ Veterans Plumbing LLC

Nick replaced a faulty hot water heater and PRV on short notice. His work ethic and expertise was impressive and commendable.  I typically value quality of work over price, but with Nick, you get both. I will call on his skills again and highly recommend his services.

Veteran Plumbing installed all the plumbing for my brand new coffee house in Acworth. It was a huge job. Nick is incredibly responsive, has extremely competitive pricing (I priced 3 different companies), and does wonderful, clean work. My job had to be inspected by the county, and they never had any issues with Nick's work. He is also enjoyable to be around, which is a bonus! Save yourself some time and call Nick for your job. You'll be glad you did!

Nick did a great job on our kitchen ceiling leak. There were three holes that needed to be repaired, and another pipe that was questionable. He replaced all 3 pipes, plus the 4th for no additional charge.  Very professional and uses the best equipment for the job. 4 patches done in under an hour.

Nick and The Veteran Plumbling LLC Team are true life savers. Each time we call, there is no job too big and there is no job too small. No matter the time of day, they are there to answer the call and provide complimentary diagnostics by phone. There is no greater value than Free Advice. And, there is no greater company than Veteran Plumbing LLC.

Fabulous job Nick!  I had some serious plumbing issues in my home (prior plumbing from a different plumber that was installed incorrectly).  Nick was able to get it all fixed quickly and CORRECTLY!  Very professional and knowledgeable!  Thank you!!!

You couldn't ask for a more honest and fair plummer. Nick came when he said he would and fixed my water leak. This is the second time I've used him and wouldn't think of having anyone else do any plumbing work for me. I highly recommend him as he makes sure the job is done correctly and offered no surprises when it came to his bill.
You won't be sorry. Just give him a call..

As I told Andy today our family has a new plumber! Our toilet was leaking and the tank needed to be replaced. Within two hours from calling he had it fixed. On top of that he noticed that the toilet was slow to fill after being flushed. It turns out the regulator off the street should have been set higher. He is very professional, quick to respond, and genuine in his desire to help his customers!

I had Josh come out and replace our water heater. He was very quick to get us on his schedule, and his price was very fair. He found a major issue with how our old water heater was piped. He made suggestions to improve the situation. Overall, it was a wonderful experience. I will recommend him in the future and will use him again for our plumbing needs.
Excellent service!  Very professional!  Thank you for the expert work.
Quickly got straw cleaners and toothpicks out of our pipes that our hand auger couldn't snatch up. What a relief. Worth every penny.
Professional and responsive. Fixed everything quickly.

Recommended to us by a neighbor, gave them a call and they came by that evening to look at job needed. Josh and his crew it has logs in, replaced a bathtub and leaky sprayer in kitchen. Great job, respectful young men, and very fair priced. Before they left asked if there was anything else that needed to be done.  Highly recommend!!
Was very accommodating and did a great job!

Called me right back. Came when he said he would. Got the job done quickly. Not to mention price was very fair. I called at least 7 plumbers from Gadsden to Rainbow City either they did not call back as they said they would or never showed up. Will def use him again.

Highly Recommend! He was quick to respond to our call, he came to the house the next day and was on time!!! Great Work, we were more than pleased. Will definitely be using again for any plumbing needs in the future.
Best guy around........
Great Plumber!!! Very professional!!!😊
I wish I could rate him 5+ plus Blake Bishop did an awesome job for me today.  I would recommend him very highly. You won’t go wrong very reasonable price. Thank you again.

His experience was greatly appreciated and we will not hesitate to call for his services again for future plumbing needs..
I could not be more pleased with the work performed by Bishop’s Plumbing. The service was very prompt and the price was unbeatable. I will not hesitate to use their services in the future.

Have used K-Wood Plumbing many times and they have always come through. Great guy, always responsive and has helped me in a pinch several times. Will always be my first call.

We had a leaking gas water heater. I called K-Wood about 2:00 this afternoon, and the water heater that I picked up today was installed by 4:30. Fast and professional service at less than half the price the larger plumbing companies wanted. They even hauled away my old heater.
5 stars has never let us down at our complex. Wheather it is big or small.
K-Wood was excellent. They responded timely, did a great job, were very nice and very reasonably priced! Will definitely use again!

Called to get a damaged shower repaired. Told him about the problem and he was able to give me a non binding guesstimate over the phone. I ask you who is willing to do that. Showed up the next day on time. Accessed the problem and he needed to do a little more than either of us anticipated, a whole $76 so no big deal. He and his helper were courteous, professional and fast. Job well done! We will defiantly use them again.

Kelli and his team were so professional and did a great job! They showed up early, installed our water heater, and Kelli even unclogged the drain in our tub for no charge though they weren't there for that. Our water heater is working great and we'll be using them for our other plumbing needs!
Did a great job. Responsible price.
Great customer service. The technician kept me abreast of everything going on. Will surely call on your company again really soon.
great rates
Professional. Efficient. Excellent work. Work was completed within 24 hours of request for appointment. Definitely recommend!

They were very professional and on time.

This company always does a great job! Thank you again.

Taylor was quick to respond. I was on his schedule for the next day. He arrived on time and was able to take care of our problem right away. Very professional and knowledgeable. Great customer service. Will be glad to work with him again.
Great experience! The guys were quick, efficient and very helpful! Great work! They were very personable!
I thank them for their service and I would highly recommend the company.

The two men were on time, very nice and polite, 25 min, I was able to wash, Thanks again,If you need some plumbing call Topnotch plumbing.👩‍🔧 I called them again Thanks right on time , 08 /4/22,+12/13/22
Very professional and friendly. Quick and efficient! Got the job done! Thanks you guys :-)
Taylor was very professional and did an awesome job.
Awesome customer service. Mr. Taylor did a fantastic and thorough job. I highly recommend.

Taylor has done a couple of plumbing jobs for me (clearing bathtub clog and clearing washing machine drain) and has done an excellent job for a very fair price. I have recommended him to family and coworkers who needed plumbing work done. He has been able to get appointments for me in one to two days, and has been able to finish the jobs very quickly. I have been very pleased with Taylor's work, and I plan on going back to Top Notch for any future plumbing work I may need.

UPDATE:  I needed my bathtub drain cleaned out again, and Taylor was the first call I made. I called on a Sunday, planning to leave a voice message for the next day. Taylor returned my call quickly and said he should be able to see me on Tuesday, which was about the time-line I expected. When I received the scheduling message from him a little later, he was able to fit me in on Monday, instead.  As always, the work was fast and fantastic, and Taylor is very friendly and professional with extremely reasonable rates. So glad I have him in my phone book!
Good professional job done by these guys!

If I could give more than 5 stars I would. I contacted them (a person actually answered the phone which is very rare these days) while in Tennessee and Taylor was so nice, got my problem fixed before I got home so I did not have to go without water in my house.
They have replaced a hot water heater and today replaced my bathroom faucet
I have already told my neighbors about his company, Top Notch Plumbing & Drain Cleaning, LLC.
I am very pleased.
Pat Jellison

Taylor did a Topnotch job today. He was professional and very courteous. Thank you all for helping me so quickly.I am pleased with my new toilet.

Arrived on time and is very nice to deal with. Assessed our plumbing situation and gave us his recommended solution which included replacing the entire commode. I just want to give a shout out to Top Notch Plumbing. I had a leak I had been trying to find for almost two months. It finally came to the surface in my front flower bed. It only took two hours start to finish. I also want to thank American leak for coming out first thing in the morning to pinpoint the leak so didn't have to dig up flower bed too much.
Awesome in a time we were panicking, very professional. Definitely will tell my friends
My bathtub faucet was leaking water and I put in a work order to my apartment maintenance. You guys came out and stopped the leak.

Excellent service, and fast response. I love a company that can give me a quote without wasting my time with a service call fee first. Any plumber should know what they would charge to replace a toilet. I will definitely use them again when needed.

Service was “top notch” just like their name. They were extremely helpful and honest through our whole process of getting a new hot water heater. Great price and will definitely be using them for any future needs!!
Honest company ! Can’t wait to use their services again!
Absolutely loved using Topnotch! They responded quickly to my request and came on time. Work was done quickly, professionally, and was reasonably priced. Absolutely will use Topnotch again.

reviews.review_text: Buddy was here exactly when he said he would be. He got right to work and had me fixed up in a jiffy. Left no sign he was here. Quick in and out. I will be using him from now on.

I highly recommend Muddy Buddy Plumbing!!

"Very professional and friendly. Highly recommend this company! He fixed my flooding driveway in a few short hours. Great value especially for such a large job!"

He came out, changed a part, and installed a new toilet, for under half of what we were previously quoted.  The work was excellent.  They cleaned up after themselves, and left no mess.  We will only use this plumbing company in the future.  Give them a call!!!!!"

Had a bad leak in my front yard. Justin answered the phone right away when I called. He came out very quickly on a holiday. Located the problem and fixed in a timely matter. Justin explained the process as he went along. He was very professional and I would definitely recomend.

Amazing quality, excellent service, great prices.
Justin is a good and dependable plumber. He’s completed several projects for us and does really good work.
Justin arrived on schedule and solved our problem.  He was very courteous and professional.  I would use him again when I need plumbing work.  Very pleased with the work he performed.

reviews.review_text: THE BEST OF THE BEST! LOVE THE CREW AT SURE FLOW SO MUCH, SO HELPFUL AND EXTREMELY KNOWLEDGEBLE!

Tre and his crew are awesome! They've handled our stub out, in wall, and fixture setting for our commercial barn project. They're professional, fast, know the codes, and just all around awesome. I have used champion multiple times and they always do a great job. I will recommend them to everyone from now on.

Definitely recommend Champion Plumbing. Had a plumbing leak under my kitchen sink and Patrick Sullivan came and fixed the same day I called. Just want to give a shout out to Champion Plumbing and Remodeling LLC and Remodeling LLCas we had had a water line break yesterday and Patrick and his friend went “above and beyond” yesterday and last night. Thank you both so much as you were truly a blessing me and my family. I will highly recommend Champion Plumbing to everyone. Extremely professional and friendly!!!

MOST EXCELLENT SERVICE‼️ I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY. EFFICIENT, FRIENDLY, PROFESSIONAL.

Very responsive and very professional.
Would recommend 100 percent
Im not the type of person that trust easy but let me tell you great guy very eager to get the job done and seems very excited about making sure all your needs are done and done right the first time.

Patrick came to the house twice.  One company told me I needed to spend $4000  to repair the issue.  Patrick corrected the issue for 460.  He is a honest guy.  I will use him again!

We had a septic back up on April 24th which was on a weekend. It's been a two month process and he has been there to help at a moment's notice every step of the way. We cannot recommend him strongly enough!  As long as he's in this business, he will get all of our plumbing business. Great guy with a strong work ethic and is a veteran as well!  We are so appreciative of his time and help. Patrick with Champion was great! Professional and on time. Was also almost $200 less than others. I definitely have a new go to plumber!

He was thorough, fast & most importantly fixed my problem. The drain pipe was disconnected & dumping everything under my house. Thank You!!!!!  You will be who I call 1st next time. I highly recommend this local biz😊
Excellent service, fast and efficient. We will use Chris for all our future plumbing work.
Chris was very knowledgeable, diagnosed and fixed our problem quickly. We highly recommend Chris Mayo Plumbing and will definitely use him again if needed.

glory-plumbing-and-drain-cleaning-servic.business name: Glory Plumbing and Drain Cleaning Services, Llc

reviews.review_text: Antwon the owner did an amazing job. He was prompt and very knowledgeable. He not only called right back, but he also charged exactly what he quoted. I was also pleased with his invoicing system. I received an invoice along with a detailed breakdown and picture of my services rendered. I definitely recommend and will use Glory plumbing again.

High quality, prompt, and professional service that I highly recommend.

Antwon and his team arrived to my home early, and quickly got to work assessing the problem we had with two malfunctioning faucets and fixing it.  He even checked to make sure our water pressure was at the recommended levels to preempt any future issues.  All for an affordable price.

If your husband is like me, handy but really better at making temporary fixes until you can find a long term solution, then call Glory Plumbing and get them scheduled for a visit.  They'll get you squared away.
Love his work..Accurate,Knowledgeable and got the job done for a good price..5 ⭐️

This company is highly recommended. They came out in less than hour for an emergency plumbing service call after business hours. He is now one of our preferred Service Pros.

Antwuan was very very VERY professional and took care of my water leak issues. He squeezed me into his busy day in such short notice and went above and beyond to tend the services that was needed. I highly recommend his services to anyone in need of any plumbing related issues. Thank you!!!!!!!!!
He was fast,professional,and very informative about the job and process.Great Job! I recommend to anyone with a plumbing problem.
He was very professional. He finished at a timely fashion. It’s very hard trying to find a reasonable plumber. I feel he is a very fair plumber!

Listen... I can not say enough about how pleased, impressed and THANKFUL I am for this company!! He didn't just patch it up, he thoroughly fixed the problems, explaining everything along the way!! Kind, courteous and very professional!!  I highly recommend this company!!$$
This company is the BEST!!! Very professional, very clean, and very fast. He came in same day repaired a broken toilet and flange. He is the best in town!!!! HANDS DOWN!!!!

Antwon helped us remodel our bathroom. We hired him after our initial contractor made a mess of the plumbing install, and he was communicative, patient, and thorough. He is trustworthy, kind and skilled as a plumber, and we are grateful to have worked with him! We will hire him again next time we need a plumber.

This is one of the best Plummer by Far. If he gives you a time trust me he's on point. His work is very professional and he does a great job. And don't mind explaining any questions you might have. I don't know about most people but being a home owner it's hard to find a professional Plummer. My search is over he is the real deal 💯

I had previously used Glory Drain and they did a great job! When I called this time, they were once again prompt, professional and complete the job in a timely manner. I will definitely use them again if needed!

Glory Drain is superb in every way. As accidents go, I experienced a plumbing mishap late on a Friday night. It got a bit more complex given that it might have been linked to a previous repair by the city. GD not only reached my home within an hour of notice, they stuck with us until the city came out and did its due diligence a few days later.  If you are looking for excellent service and pride of ownership, Glory Drain is the company for you.

The last company made a quick fix to stop our kitchen sink from clogging, but it came back and this company was referred to me.  They explained the issue, costs and made repairs in a timely manner.  They’re thorough.

My insurance sent there plumber out they did work then it started to leak.  We were fed up and ready to replace the service line. Glory Drain was the only estimate we could afford.   They came out the very next day and finished in less than 5 hours.   They even helped me apply to utility company to get a credit back for water lost from the leak.   Glory Drain Cleaning Services will be the only plumber I will call.
Great work and nice attitude

Very fast and affordable service. If you have any problems, this is who you should call.

Completely professional, quick, and very knowledgeable about all aspects of plumbing. Great company to hire, will definitely recommend to everyone I know!

He is very skilled and professional in his work and is very reasonable in his pricing! Thank you blake for such quick and excellent work! I will recommend you to everyone I know!

I am grateful to Steven Butler for the recommendation.

Quick response to my inquiries, easy to communicate with, honest and open about the prices and the process, and showed up fast to fix the issue! Thanks so much for the good work, Blake!

Amazing experience! Blake was out here quickly! Communicated the entire time ! Was the best plumber experience we have ever had. Very nice guy, extremely kind and respectful.  10/10 highly recommend. 😊

I called him last week about a shower valve leak, and he came by within hours to come check it out and gave me a FREE estimate. Blake showed me the possible causes of the leak, and then provided me with different options for the repair. He gave me a reasonable price, so we scheduled the job. He arrived ON TIME and was ready to get to work thinking the whole faucet would need to be replaced and the tile would need to be cut out. Once he started the job, he was HONEST and explained that some simple parts were all that were needed to repair the leak which LOWERED the cost significantly. He is organized, and the invoice was easy to pay right then by credit card with an instant digital receipt for my records.
Amazing service and repair. Would highly, highly  recommend the Cochran Brothers for any plumbing needs/repairs!
Great service! Will definitely use again!

My elderly mom lives in Gadsden and a water leak had dripped downstairs into her den. She did not know what was wrong. I tried to find someone who could come soon to find the leak and fix it. Many plumbers do not return calls or are booked out for days. Jonathan at Machen did return my call and said to call Cochran Brothers. I am so glad I did! He came out the very next morning at 8:30 and said it was the toilet tank upstairs. He replaced the toilet that same morning. We will always use Cochran for our plumbing problems.
Another handyman had looked upstairs and wanted to tear out the tile wall. I am so glad we didn't do that! It's best to call a licensed plumber and I recommend Cochran Brothers.
They worked with my husband and did great and efficient job.
Derrick has an outstanding work ethic. He is focused and pays attention to every detail. I've worked around contractors and he is at the top of the line. Very thankful.

They even had to reconfigure my washer and dryer set up to accommodate the new water heater, and they didn’t leave until they ensured everything was working as it should for me. I’ll be recommending them to anyone I know with plumbing issues and I’ll be a return customer in the future for sure! Thanks again Tristan and Nathaniel!
